data: MH Form 4 x 1 Orders (Module)
Status
Involuntary admissions under the Mental Health Act alter a client’s fundamental legal and human rights. It is critical that all relevant MHA Forms are completed in a timely manner
Form 4 x1
Consults/Referrals

Social Workers and Nurses are responsible for completing MHA Forms 5, 13, 15, 16, and other supplementary forms. Entering the following orders will help ensure these clinicians are notified of a client’s certification
Social Work Consult
Urgent, Mental Health or Substance Use, Client is certified under MHA Form 4. Forms 13, 15, 16 must be completed within 24 hours

PLACEHOLDER: Nursing MHA Task  Order Sentence: MHA Form 4 x 1 has been submitted for this client. Supplementary Forms 5, 13, 15, 16 must be completed within 24 hours  Order Comment: Track form completion using the “MHA Form Tracker” IView Band (use Pediatric version for those less than 16 years of age)

As per the MHA standards, an Indigenous Health consult should be offered to the client within 24 hours of certification under the MHA. With the client’s permission and consent, please order this consult if it is applicable to the client       OR  With the client’s permission, a consult to Indigenous health supports (or Indigenous cultural/wellness supports) should be offered within 24 hours of certification. With the client’s permission and consent, please order this consult if it is applicable to the client
